page.title: 03GRESHAM'S PREP SCHOOL.
page.content: IN SEPTEMBER 1984 THE PREP SCHOOL BECAME SEPARATE FROM THE SENIOR SCHOOL. THE MAXIMUM CHILDREN{IN A FORM {IS 20.}AT THE MOMENT THERE ARE{142}IN SCHOOL. IN SEPTEMBER THERE WILL BE{150 IN THE PREP SCHOOL. THERE ARE 24 TEACHERS. GRESHAM'S PREP SCHOOL IS A PUBLIC SCHOOL.THE HEADMASTER EXPLAINED THE DIFFERENCES BETWEEN A STATE SCHOOL AND A PUBLIC SCHOOL. THEY WORK LONGER FROM{7:45AM TO 6 PM.}THERE ARE SOME ACTIVITIES TO DO SO SOME GO HOME {AT 8 PM.}THEY ALSO WORK ON SATURDAYS. THERE ARE 8 CLASSES IN THE PREP SCHOOL. THEY HAVE SEPARATE CLASSES FOR EACH LESSON. THEY HAVE A WIDE CHOICE OF LESSONS. AT PLAYTIME, AS WELL AS ALLOWING CRISPS, THEY EVEN HAVE A TUCK SHOP. THE FEES ARE BETWEEN {Â£2400 AND Â£3000}PER YEAR. THE SCHOOL IS A CHARITABLE TRUST RUN BY THE FISHMONGER'S COMPANY.
